TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the families of drugs called angiogenesis inhibitors and protein tyrosine kinase inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Es un tipo de inhibidor de la angiogénesis y un inhibidor de proteínas tirosina–cinasas.
